result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:12 pm 
INCLUDES 15CF275, 15CF358, AND 15CF372. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig for Kyle Mayo; Def appears in person with Atty Andrew Morgan.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to:
In 15CF275: Ct. 2 (Manufacture-Deliver THC/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF358: Ct. 1 (Manufacture-Deliever Non-Narcotics)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF372: Ct. 3 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Possess Illegally Obtained Prescriptions)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CF275: Ct. 1 (Manufacture-Deliver THC/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CF372: Ct. 1 (Possession of THC)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Atty Morgan makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: In 15CF275: Ct. 1>>SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITION: 6 months MCJ imposed and STAYED for rule violations and only to be used if approved by court. 
                           : In 15CF372: Cts. 1 & 2>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
COURT ORDERS as CONDITIONS of probation in ALL>>assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; fulltime employment/school/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours CS per week; AODA; absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent approval; DNA sample and surcharge; CC including $360 buy money to Wausau PD. 
COURT finds the deft is entitled to 4 days jail credit if revoked in both files. 

Adj: 2:30 pm

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 1:17 pm  
INCLUDES 15CF275, 15CF358, AND 15CF372. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig for Kyle Mayo; Deft appears in person with Atty Andrew Morgan. 
Date and Time set for FPT. 
State notes parties have not reached an agreement at this time. Discovery is complete. 
COURT advises parties to file MIL and JI 3 business days before trial. 
COURT sets calendar call on 7/29/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 1:18 pm
Final pre-trial on July 20, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Status conference on June 12, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 22, 2015 at 09:50 am.

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 1:42 pm 
INCLUDES 15CF275, 15CF358, AND 15CF372. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Deft appears in person with Atty Andrew Morgan. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed. 
Court questions deft as to waivers. 
Court finds waivers freely and voluntarily made. 
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Informations filed.  Readings Waived. 
Plea: Not Guilty on all. 
COURT sets calendar call for 5/13/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA. 
Bond: Continued.
